data: Welcome
Please have a seat
I am Ben Pershing, General of the army
I am pleased to inform you that you are the lucky candidate who has been chosen for this job
What you have to do should be pretty straight forward
We need you to communicate to our allies overseas
I will hand you some notes with the information that we need to transmit
Just type them on the teleprinter and the system will transmit everything via the telegraph network
Let us start then
Try sending them this handshake message
Very good
Our references suggested your name due to your supposed high loyalty and reliability
You do understand that in this job mistakes cannot be forgiven
Keep up the good work
Enough work for today
See you tomorrow, and be on time
Welcome
Long time no see
My name is William Slovik
You probably do not remember, but indeed we have already met before
You were one of the candidates from the last round of admissions
Anyway, today Mr. Pershing is busy
I will be giving you assignments until his returnal
Great
Great work, you can go back to your family now
Good morning
Let us start the day
Listen
Today we have a critical assignment
Do not disappoint me
Hey buddy
I believe the General has made a slight mistake
Send this note instead, will you?
It is very important so do not mess this up
We also have this one
The General was in a hurry and had a slight oversight
Do me a favor and send this rectified version instead of his
Enough work for today
See you tomorrow
Good morning
We have to talk
I have reasons to suspect that someone in this office is reading my notes
Someone else that is not you
For this reason, today I will be giving you encrypted messages
Ever heard of the Caeser Cypher?
My messages will have all the letters shifted by one position on the alphabet
This means A becomes B, B becomes C and so on
Be sure to decrypt them before typing. This code is between you and me only
Our allies would not understand a single word
Try with this
See? It is not that hard after all
Hey man
I want to be honest with you
I believe the General is plotting something
His notes look suspicious
Please ignore his orders and send this to our allies

quest.text: Fourth of July transfer to YVR

data: Thanks to your support, I will now be leading this operation
Thanks for your support
Our operation has the maximum priority and must not be stopped by subversives
This is our last communication for today
You can head home now
Welcome
Please have a sit
Our colleague, Colonel Slovik was found guilty of treason
He is being arrested in this very moment
The time has finally come
To get back what is ours
This is it
My friend
Our General never had good intentions
But thanks to you and me, we are safe
Let me show you something
You have been warned
Mistakes are not tolerated here
Goodbye
